titleStmt.title: Dialogue. M. Why am I daily thus perplext? Why beyond womans patience vext? ...

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title and first line of text.
Dialogue [between M(ary of Modena) and J(ames II) .. -- Wing.
Identified on UMI microfilm reel 1775 as Wing D1288B.
Reproduction of originals in: Harvard University Library and Henry E. Huntington Library.
